import React, { useState } from "react"; import { ThemeProvider, Div, Row, Col, Text, Anchor, Image, Icon } from "atomize"; import SignUpModal from "./SignUp" function Nav() { const [userLoggedIn, setUserLoggedIn] = useState(false) const [modal, showModal] = useState(false) const theme = { fontFamily: { primary: 'Teko, sans-serif', secondary: 'Oswald, sans-serif' } } return(
{userLoggedIn ? NETFLIX CLIQUES JOIN A CLIQUE ABOUT USERNAME : NETFLIX CLIQUES JOIN A CLIQUE ABOUT SIGN IN showModal(true)} d="flex" align="center" textColor="white" hoverTextColor="danger800"> SIGN UP showModal(false)} /> }
) } export default Nav;
